original_title: Eighty oxygen cylinders stolen from Polonnaruwa Hospital, six arrested
original_body_lines: Six suspects were arrested over the theft and sale of at least 80 cylinders of oxygen from the Polonnaruwa General Hospital, Police said.

The suspects include a staff of the hospital as well as five others employed by an oxygen supplier. At least 208 cylinders had been reported missing since March 2020, according to a complaint lodged by the Hospital Director.
